column1: newgirlgifs 50496472592 "2013-05-15 14:14:30 GMT" http://newgirlgifs.tumblr.com/post/50496472592/new-girl-season-3-scoop-boss-talks-nick-and-jess "  Jake Johnson’ Nick. And Zooey Deschanel’s Jess. Rode. Off. Into. The. Sunset. Literally. Excuse us for a moment while we continue to squeal like a little girl at her first sleepover party over New Girl’s season finale
column2: which ended with Nick and Jess officially in a relationship. (Call it the anti-will-they-or-won’t-they!) And in a fun twist
column3: it was Schmidt (Max Greenfield) who ended the hit Fox sitcom’s sophomore run on a romantic cliffhanger
column4: torn between Elizabeth (Meritt Wever) and Cece (Hannah Simone)
column5: who called off her wedding. So what can we expect from the gang in season three? We went straight to New Girl executive producer Brett Baer for scoop on what’s ahead for Nick and Jess
column6: couple edition—including a possible trip to Mexico? Plus
column7: will there be a major time jump?!  " True link

column1: newgirlgifs 50419387863 "2013-05-14 13:52:56 GMT" http://newgirlgifs.tumblr.com/post/50419387863/taylor-swift-on-new-girl-5-reveals-from-her "Taylor makes her primetime comedy debut at 9 p.m. TONIGHT on Fox’s ‘New Girl’!  At first
column2: it might seem ironic that the May 14 season finale of New Girl is titled “Elaine’s Big Day
column3: ” considering Elaine — played by Taylor Swift – actually appears on screen for a very small portion of the episode. But if you really break the finale down
column4: it is a big one for Taylor
column5: as well as every Swifty watching from home. HollywoodLife.com got an early look at Taylor’s brief appearance
column6: and because we know how much you all hate waiting
column7: we’ve got a few teases to tide you over. " True link
